items.title: Britannia says strike disrupts Gujarat plant operations
items.description: The company is in continuous discussions with workers to resolve the strike, which began on Monday, the company said in an exchange filing.

items.title: Matsya 6000: All you need to know about India’s first crewed deep-sea submersible
items.description: The submersible is set to take three Indians into deep sea in 2026

items.title: Actis acquires Stride Climate's 371MW portfolio from Macquarie Group
items.description: The deal sees Actis take charge of Stride’s 371MW (414MWp) portfolio of operating solar PV assets spread across 21 projects in 7 states, the majority of which are concentrated in the state of Gujarat

items.title: Donald Trump may find himself in a bind on tariffs on generic drugs
items.description: Indian generics saved the US healthcare system $219 billion in 2022 and $1.3 trillion between 2013 and 2022, IQVIA has said

items.title: Why this mid-sized IT company deserves attention amid its performance turnaround
items.description: The company’s revenue traction has been impressive, margin performance resilient, and order inflows strong

items.title: Will Germany’s fiscal boost fire up Indian defence stocks?
items.description: Germany’s upper house late last week voted in favour of reforming the German “debt brake”, paving the way for a €1-trillion defence and infrastructure investment package
